Definition: In this task, you will be given sentences in which your task is to recognize the name of the location or place. Although there might be several correct answers, you need to write one of them.

Positive Examples.input: I have been staying in New York for quite some time.
Positive Examples.explanation: New York, being a popular city in US, is considered as a location and hence should be tagged.

Positive Examples.input: The beaches at Florida are amazingly beautiful !
Positive Examples.explanation: Florida, being a popular state in US, is considered as a location and hence should be tagged.

Negative Examples.input: Shakespeare has been writing a lot of his novels centering around central Europe.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here, Europe is an incomplete mention of the location . It is because the main qualifier, which actually helps to figure out the location is missing. The correct answer is central Europe.

Negative Examples.input: Let us meet at the city centre 2.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here, city centre is an incomplete mention of the location. It is because the qualifier or the numeric entity following it, which actually helps to figure out the location is missing. The correct answer is city centre 2.
